saying: What is cheap is most costly.
description: Tiffany is a rabbit villager with a snooty personality. She is a new character who first appeared in Doubutsu no Mori e+, a Japanese only game, then reappeared in Animal Crossing: Wild World and every game since. Her initial phrase, bun bun, is a reference to the word "bunny." Her name is the same as the Japanese version of Celia, another villager.
